name: GetFixedAssetsList
description:
Retrieve a list of fixed assets from Zoho Books.

Use this tool to obtain a detailed list of fixed assets stored in Zoho Books. Ideal for managing and reviewing asset inventories.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the organization for which to list fixed assets.

parameters.name: filter_fixed_asset_status
parameters.description: Filter the fixed asset list by status. Valid inputs: Status.All, Status.Active, Status.Cancel, Status.FullyDepreciated, Status.WriteOff, Status.Sold, Status.Draft.

value_schema.description: Filter fixed asset by fixed asset status. Allowed Values: Status.All, Status.Active, Status.Cancel, Status.FullyDepreciated, Status.WriteOff, Status.Sold and Status.Draft

parameters.name: sort_by_column
parameters.description: Specify the column to sort the fixed asset list. Choose from: asset_name, asset_number, asset_cost, created_time, current_asset_value.

value_schema.description: Sort fixed asset list. Allowed Values: asset_name, asset_number, asset_cost, created_time and current_asset_value

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Sort the fixed asset list in ascending or descending order. Use 'A' for ascending and 'D' for descending.

value_schema.description: Sort fixed asset list in ascendeing or descending order. Allowed Values: A and D

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: The page number to fetch from the fixed asset list. Defaults to 1 if not specified.

value_schema.description: Page number to be fetched. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Number of fixed asset records to fetch per page. Default is 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the zoho-books API.

parameters.name: filter_by
parameters.description: Filter fixed asset by fixed asset status. Allowed Values: Status.All, Status.Active, Status.Cancel, Status.FullyDepreciated, Status.WriteOff, Status.Sold and Status.Draft

value_schema.description: Filter fixed asset by fixed asset status. Allowed Values: Status.All, Status.Active, Status.Cancel, Status.FullyDepreciated, Status.WriteOff, Status.Sold and Status.Draft

parameters.name: sort_column
parameters.description: Sort fixed asset list. Allowed Values: asset_name, asset_number, asset_cost, created_time and current_asset_value

value_schema.description: Sort fixed asset list. Allowed Values: asset_name, asset_number, asset_cost, created_time and current_asset_value

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Sort fixed asset list in ascendeing or descending order. Allowed Values: A and D

value_schema.description: Sort fixed asset list in ascendeing or descending order. Allowed Values: A and D

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to be fetched. Default value is 1.

value_schema.description: Page number to be fetched. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
